nodes.text: The Enhanced AT-ST Walker was a model of AT-ST walker used by the Army of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War against the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It had been outfitted with enhanced power couplings and sub-systems, which allowed its weapons to fire high powered blasts at a faster rate than average. The performance modifications were built around existing systems, which visibly differentiated the Enhanced AT-ST from standard AT-ST walkers, with two such differences being dark colored armor plates and the absence of side-mounted weapons on the command pod.
